article_metadata.title: Marco Rubio may have presidential announcement date: April 13 at Freedom Tower | Miami Herald

og.description: The Freedom Tower is apparently one of several venues under consideration by Marco Rubio, but it could be an ideal postcard setting to kick off a presidential campaign promoting the promise and greatness of America by the son of Cuban immigrants.
og.title: Marco Rubio may have presidential announcement date: April 13 at Freedom Tower
